name: rubbish-bins
description: You're rooting around in the Red Gate rubbish bins. What depths have you stooped to?

inventory.name: skip
inventory.detailedDescription:
It's full of rubbish.
It looks like a great place to hide things you don't want found!

attributes.defaultResult:
You clamber around in the skip.
After putting your hand in something slimy and nearly impaling yourself on a broken chair you decide to climb back out.

inventory.name: kitchen knife
inventory.detailedDescription:
It's rusty and old but still extremely sharp.
Is that dried blood on the hilt?

inventory.name: battered book
inventory.detailedDescription:
The texture of the cover gives you a slightly uncomfortable feeling.
The flyleaf simply says 'To Neil'. Further inspection reveals a heavily faded title; 'O  H nt  g Hu  ns'.
Odd.

missions.name: hunthumans
missions.description:
... 'In s  king nd tr  k ng your qu   y, it s  mp rt nt to be aw re  f scent.
 he  atura  t ail  f ph rom nes, decays over time.
Where a sc  t is suf  cien  y fr  h, on  may h nt  r f nd the b st dir ctio   n wh ch to fo lo '...
Wow, this is really badly degraded. I'm sure there's something really useful hiding in here if you can just figure it out.

reward.message: Interesting. You feel like you've learned something important but will need to figure out exactly what it is.
